Description: Police departments buying ETK 800s for police service were offered the exclusive police performance package available for law enforcement only. Designed to extend the service life of the car, as well as boost performance, the police performance package added multiple upgraded parts. Included in the package: A high performance, heavy duty radiator for heavy use, heavy duty brakes, an LED light bar, ttc10 wheels, and AWD. The turbocharged 3.0L I6 Diesel produced 270 HP for pursuit situations, while also maintaining good fuel economy to keep costs low.
